tests.prompt: Verify features/types.go has no RageID or SecondWindID constants
Verify conditions/types.go has no RagingID, BrutalCriticalID, UnarmoredDefenseID, or FightingStyleID constants
Verify features/factory.go uses refs.Module instead of "dnd5e" string literal
Verify features/factory.go uses refs.TypeFeatures instead of "features" string literal
Run go test ./rulebooks/dnd5e/... and verify all tests pass
Run make pre-commit and verify it passes
